long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Global Speed Accelerator enhances your online video and audio streaming experience by enabling you to adjust playback speed across various platforms. This user-friendly MV3 extension seamlessly integrates into your browser without the need for additional tabs or intrusive requests.

With Global Speed Accelerator, you can increase the playback speed of your video and audio by up to 1000%, allowing you to breeze through content at your preferred pace.

Simply access the extension's pop-up menu in your browser tab, where you can easily adjust the playback speed slider to your desired setting.

As the Chrome store transitions to MV3, rest assured that Global Speed Accelerator is already compatible with this new framework, ensuring uninterrupted support.

We respect your privacy and do not require access to audio recording. Instead, our extension operates using alternative methods to protect your data.

It allows for fullscreen video playback without disrupting the fullscreen mode.

Key Features:

    Increase video playback speed by up to 1000%
    No need for extra tabs
    No permission requests
    No disruption to fullscreen mode
    Completely free
    MV3 compatible
